articles.title: Stephen Curry & Co. cap resurgent season with the Warriors' FOURTH title in the last eight years - Daily Mail
articles.description: Two years after posting the NBA's worst record, the Golden State Warriors found themselves atop the basketball universe in Boston on Thursday with a 103-90 win over the Celtics in Game 6 of the Finals.
articles.content: Golden State Warriors teammates Stephen Curry, Klay Thompson, and Draymond Green seemed right at home celebrating their fourth title on Thursday night in Boston following a 103-90 win over the Celtic… [+11998 chars]
